item.title: SSH CA - How to add?
item.description:
Based on openssh environment

1. Copy an SSH CA certificate file

2. Edit sshd_config file

/etc/ssh/sshd_config

3. Add CA certificate location

TrustedUserCAKeys [PATH]

4. systemctl restart

item.title: Credentials
item.description:
SSH CA Public Key

ssh-rsa  SSH-CA-USER
  • Download
